column2: KEDENGGA KPEEKPE YOO EYU WALA TOM
Yee ditisaa se pumuna eyaa se pewee kimang wala esindaa ne pikena wazag puyu koyo, ditisaa dodo se peede ejade yoo ti-yoo weu, toovonum ne laheziye paligna;

Dinaa se eyu wala tom kiising ne ti-yoo kiidong palabina ne kiweekim toyi ne piceyig eyaa. Mbu pacag se ejade elegzi wetu, eyaa wee pa-ti yoo, poyooduu yem faaa ne piwili se pali kunong taa, soondu eetasig-we kpau;
Yee wade kewiyag ekandayig eyu wala yoo camiye koyo, widiyi piikag eyu enu kenau kijeyuu se ekuyi kewiyag ngga ko-yoo se kalaki-i nang;
Puwe camiye se pasina ajeya, akpeeti ne ala taabaliye duu tumiye deu ne puhuuna-ye;

Dinaa se ajeya kigbenduu nggbeye pagtu takayag taa ke eyaa kpeekpe tasi tisuu eyu wala ne e-wazag po-tom, ne poto se abalaa ne halaa pewe kimang wala ana a-esindaa; mbu labina ne paka nuu se pekpeetig samag sinau tumiye yoo ne pisa pewee pa-ti yoo camiye;
Ajeya kigbeduu nggbeye taa ajeya tisaa se alaki ne eyaa kpeekpe na eyu wala, ele puwee se nggbeye edu-ye nisi;
Yee eyaa tingge iwena limagziye kudumdiye eyu wala ne e-ti yoo weu tom yoo koyo, pisang ne pala tumiye ndi.
MBU AJEYA KIGBENDUU NGGBEYE KEDIGZAG SOSOO TOM SE:

KEDENGGA KPEEKPE YOO EYU WALA TOM tune tike ajeya wena kedengga kpeekpe yoo eyu wala tom we a-nung taa yo a-limagziye; ne pisa aceyi a-ti, akuli nggbeye dine da-ajeya eyaa ne ajeya leena eyaa ese ne pana eyu wala ne e-ti yoo weu tom.
Hoolag 1
Paluluu eyaaa ne pa-ti yoo weu kpaagbaa ne pewee kimang wala esindaa. Paluluu-we ne po-long ne pa-magzim; mbu yekina ne posooli dama se peke eyaa pa-tingge.
Hoolag 2
Paa eyu weyi, eke kisem, kikpedu, kuhulum, nimdu, kedeyag, paa eke cooci nggu ki-taa tu, elag siinaa, epizig eto se kedengga kpeekpe yoo eyu wala wena poyoodi a-tom ciellne yo, ake dodo e-nina.
Mbu dodo paa eyu elina le, eke ejade ndi diwe di-ti yoo yo, difeyi di-ti yoo yo di-taa tu, yaa di-poliitikii ke nggu, paapizig poto se eyu wala tom tune tidatagna-i.
Hoolag 3
Paa ani, ewena wade se eweena wezuu, ewee e-ti yoo ne ekandayi e-ti yoo.
Hoolag 4
Pifeyi se nooyu ewee yomiye taa; ele padaadu-i dodo kunong. Pekizi yomiye tom.
Hoolag 5
Pifeyi se padu nooyu kunong, pekpenggesi-i, yaa palabi-i mbu pidamuna se pala eyu yo.
Hoolag 6
Paa ani, ewena wade se paa le, paya-i se caa akele.
Hoolag 7
Eyaa kpeekpe we kimang pagtu esindaa ne peweena wade dodo se pagtu ekandayi po-yoo kimang. Yee palaki-we nabuyu ne pifeyi deu, yaa piidong pagtu numau ta, piwee dodo se pakandayi po-yoo kimang.
Hoolag 8
Paa ani, ewena wade se pacag-i tom yaa pomuluu-i fangngng wala wena pagtu ha-i yo a-numau taa, ewolo eheyi ejade taa tom huyaa.
Hoolag 9
Paapizig pakpa nooyu fangng padig yaa pekezi-i tetu.
Hoolag 10
Yee pakpa eyu nooyu se elabi nabuyu, ewena wade se pahuu e-tom fayii ne pana; tideg yaa tisiki.
Hoolag 11
Eyu weyi pakpa-i ne padahuda e-tom yo, pocongna-i se edeweeki puyu; a-asegde tinaa ne e-yoo kandiyaa pasinggig e-wayi, pahuu e-tom fayii ezi pagtu pozuu yo, ne pana toovonum.
Paakpag eyu sono dooo mbu eelaba ne pidaafeyi pagtu taa yo, pu-yoo; yee pu-wayi pukoma pilii se eelabi mbu yo pike kiweekim, ne pupozuu se poho e-nanggbangguu koyo, pagtu kibindu yoo patinggig.
Hoolag 12
Pifeyi deu se eyu nooyu edu e-noo lelu tom taa yem yem.
Hoolag 13
Paa ani, ewena wade se ewolo paa le, ecag dende e-liu wee yo paa ejade ndi le di-taa.
Paa eyu weyi, ewena wade se ekuyi ejade ndi ewe di-taa yo, paa pike e-ninde, ne pimag-i dooye le, episi.
Hoolag 14
Yee pali eyu nooyu wayi doli fangngng, ewena wade se enini kuyuu duduye. Etali le, padaalo-i.
Ele, yee toovonum, eweeki nabuyu ne paninig-i se pakpa-i, efeyina wade se edu kuyuu doli.
Hoolag 15
Paa eyu weyi, ewena wade se eyaa ejade nadiye se e-te.
Pifeyi se pekizina nooyo se edaayaa e-ejade se e-te yaa edaa legzi te.
Hoolag 16

Halibiya ne abalibiya, paa pe-te le, palaki cooci nggu, patalig pe-dede le, pewena wade se pawali, pakpag halaa ne papisi disi ne si-tinaa. Pa-wala we kimang halikpagye dede; abalu wena wade se ekizi e-halu ne edooni-i; halu newena wade dodo se ekizi e-walu ne ekui e-yoo.
Pelo ne evebu, petisig se posooli dama ne puco palabi-we halikpagye sonzi. Pifeyi pakpa pa-taa nooyo ne dong.
Mizag kena samag hoye; kewena wade se samag ne kewiyag pakandayi ko-yoo.
Hoolag 17
Eyu paa weyi, paa ewe e-deke, paa ewe lalaa hekudaa, ewena wade se eweena nim.
Pifeyi deu se peleg nooyu e-nim fangngng.
Hoolag 18

Paa ani, ewena wade se elizi e-limagza faaa, eting eso tom numau nggu esoolaa yo. Pu-tobuu se wade dine diyekina ne eyu pizi eyele eso tom numau nakuyu ne eting leeku, epizi ewili eso tom numau nggu etinggig-ku yo ku-tom lalaa faaa; paa ewe e-deke yaa e ne lalaa, epizig ela pu-tumiye.
Hoolag 19

Paa eyu weyi, ewena wade se eyoodi faaa ndu emagzig yo; pu-tobuu se soondu edaakpa eyu nooyu se eeyoodi natuyu ne palabi-i nabuyu. Pu-tobuu dodo se eyu wena wade se ekedi lalaa ndu esima, enaa yaa eniwa yo.
Hoolag 20
Paa ani, ewena wade se ewolo kedigzag ne eweena nggbeye.
Pifeyi se pakpa nooyu ne dong se esuu nggbeye nadiye taa.
Hoolag 21
Paa eyu weyi, ewena wade se edu e-noo e-ejade dokuu tumiye tom taa. Emagmag epizig ela limagza yaa etingna samag lizi eyaa mba se podoki ejade yo po-yoo.
Paa ani, ewena wade se ela kewiyag tumiye nadiye.
Samag soolim kena kewiyag dong tigide. Takayisi duzuu panagna samag soolim mbu.
Hoolag 22
Paa eyu weyi, ewena wade se samag ekandayi e-yoo. Kandayuu mbu piyekina ne eyu wee e-ti yoo, ehezi nim ne esekuliye pa-ninuu numau taa.
Hoolag 23
Paa ani, ewena wade se ehig tumiye, tumiye ndi esoolaa yo, elabi-di ne mulum edaawee.
Eyaa kpeekpe wena wade se, palaki tumiye kudumdiye koyo, peheyi-we kimang, mulum edaawee.
Eyu weui elaki tumiye yo, pumunaa se peheyi-i camiye, pitali e ne e-mizag ne padaala kunong samag taa.
Paa ani, ewena wade se e ne lalaa padu nggbeye; e-nggbeye ekpendi anggba leena yoo, anggba ana awee dong ne akandayi e-yoo.
Hoolag 24
Paa ani, ewena wade se ehezi ne ecalasi e-ese, padaakili-i nazuu tumiye taa; ewena wade dodo se paa pinag ngga, paha-i fenag kudumag, ehezi ne pete peheyi-i ke-liidiya.
Hoolag 25

Paa ani, ewena wade se eweena nim ne piwazi e ne e-nimba pe-wezuu cagu taa; ezi toonag, toola, duzuye ne ko yo. Ewena wade se elaki kunong, piwig-i, elabi ejam, episi edane yaa leluu, ekpadayaa, pala nabuyu ne pasina-i.
Asong ne piya pumunaa se pasina pingngng.
Hoolag 26

Paa eyu weyi, ewena wade se pokuli e-ese. Pidamuna se peheyi koonoo sukuli yoo. Pikena paa ani kijeyuu se ewolo-ku. Puwee se legtu ne tuma kpasuu sukuli potoyi. Pupozuu dodo se patuli sukuli kitezuu nonosi paa ani.

Eyu woki sukuli se e-ese ikuli, piwazi-i e-wezuu cagu taa, pisina-i ne ena eyu wala. Kisigna eyaa ne panigna dama, pekpegu dama pa-kiweekim, paduu nggbeye. Kisigna dodo ajeya kigbenduu nggbeye tuma wena aninig langheziye yo.
Piya nimba wena wade se palizi sukuli nggu posoola se pepiya iwobi-ku yo.
Hoolag 27
Paa ani, ewena wade se edu noo faaa e-ejade sonzi tom taa ne mbu pilig pi-taa yo, piwazi-i.
Paa ani ewena wade se ekandayi mbu elaba ne e-hide see yo pu-yoo.
Hoolag 28
Paa ani, ewena wade se enag pana ne yedeyedetu edaawe ejade yoo, ezi poyooduu kedengga kpeekpe yoo eyu wala tom takayag taa yo.
Hoolag 29
Paa ani, etili esii se ewe samag ngga ka-taa feee ne pikedigna-i yo, etoo-ke kimiye.

Paa eyu weyi, edigzina se e-wala ninuu numau ne e-ti yoo weu leleng niu pa-taa le, kamag wee; pifeyi se ecezi-ke; pagtu duna-ke. Mbu yekina ne eyaa nang dama wala; mbu hagna mumau dodo se demookrasii samag taa eyaa iniina dama.
Eyu nooyu eepizig eto se enang wala ana ne pudodo ezi ajeya kigbenduu nggbeye sooluu yo.
Hoolag 30
Kedengga kpeekpe yoo eyu wala tom tune, ti-taa tu kpayi kpayi. Eyu nooyu feyi etong se hooluu kune, yaa nggu yo, kutongna se padaana wala naaye ejade dine,yaa ndi yo di-taa.
